template.title: Behavioral Risk: Impulsivity
template.summary: Pressure periods may trigger speed-over-clarity decision patterns.
template.insight: A mandatory pause protocol before major decisions reduces error cascades and relational strain.

template.title: Behavioral Risk: Overcontrol
template.summary: Under uncertainty, there is a tendency to over-manage variables and delay action.
template.insight: Better outcomes emerge when action thresholds are predefined and reviewed with objective metrics.
